allow: Bash(for file in sterling-heights.html royal-oak.html ferndale.html roseville.html grosse-pointe.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|||g' "$file")
Bash(for file in sterling-heights royal-oak ferndale roseville grosse-pointe)
Bash(do echo "$(basename "$file"): $(grep -c "Michigan Builders License No. 262400159" "$file") occurrences")
